data.name: Armor-Piercing
data.mechanic: You ranged weapon deals piercing damage. While this ammo power is equipped, ranged attacks made with this weapon ignore 2AC (+2 bonus).

data.name: Cryo
data.mechanic: Your ranged weapon deals cold damage. Ranged attacks made which Cryo Ammo equiped have a chance to Freeze the target. Unprotected creatures must make a Strength saving throw (DC 10). On a failed save, a creature is Frozen for 1 round.

data.name: Incendiary
data.mechanic: Successful ranged attacks with the weapon have a chance to set the target ablaze. The target it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 10). On a failed save, they take an additional 1d8 fire damage and 1d8 fire damage at the start of it's next turn.

data.name: Warp
data.mechanic: Warp bullets strip away additional barrier ticks. A successful ranged attack on a target with an active Barrier will strip away 2 Barrier ticks. Warp ammo can detonate primed targets.
